name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of expertise in **DevOps** methodologies, focusing on **cloud** services and **microservices** architecture. Proficient in **automated deployment** using tools such as **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **Helm**, I excel at implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and **GitOps** practices to streamline workflows and enhance project delivery. Skilled in containerization and orchestration with **Kubernetes**, I ensure robust and scalable solutions across various environments.

My technical proficiency extends to programming languages including **Java**, **JavaScript** (React, Next.js, and Vue), and **Python** (FastAPI and Django), alongside a foundational understanding of **Go** and **C#**. I have a proven track record in building SaaS platforms, and my agile approach to software development has resulted in high-performance applications tailored for the healthcare and financial industries. Additionally, I leverage my experience in cloud infrastructure with **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

I bring original strengths in developing machine learning pipelines and integrating AI/ML capabilities, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for comprehensive data solutions.
